sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { supabase } from '../lib/supabase.js'; // Breeder components matching trainer UI structure const BreederOverview = ({ user, profile }) => { const stats = { activeDogs: 8, currentLitters: 3, waitingList: 12, healthCertifications: 100 }; return (
{/* Welcome Header */}

Welcome back, {profile?.full_name?.split(' ')[0] || user?.email?.split('@')[0] || 'Professional Breeder'}

You have {stats.currentLitters} active litters and {stats.waitingList} families on your waiting list.

{/* Quick Stats */}

Breeding Dogs

{stats.activeDogs}

ğŸ•

Current Litters

{stats.currentLitters}

ğŸ¾

Waiting List

{stats.waitingList}

ğŸ“‹

Health Certifications

{stats.healthCertifications}%

âœ…
{/* Current Litters & Recent Activity */}
{/* Current Litters */}

Current Litters

ğŸ•

No litters yet

Your litters and breeding information will appear here

{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

ğŸ¾

Bella's litter health check completed

2 hours ago

ğŸ“‹

New family added to waiting list

4 hours ago

ğŸ’¬

Message from Johnson family about puppy availability

6 hours ago

); }; const BreederLitters = ({ user, profile }) => { const [litters, setLitters] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); React.useEffect(() => { loadLitters(); }, [user]); const loadLitters = async () => { if (!user?.id) { setLoading(false); return; } try { // For now, show empty state since litters system isn't implemented yet // In the future, this would fetch from a litters database table setLitters([]); } catch (error) { console.error('Error loading litters:', error); setLitters([]); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; return (

Marketplace Litters

Manage litters available on the marketplace

{loading ? (

Loading litters...

) : (
{litters.map((litter) => (

{litter.dam_name} x {litter.sire_name}

{litter.available_puppies} available

{litter.breed} â€¢ {litter.puppy_count} puppies

ğŸ“… Born: {litter.birth_date} ğŸ  Ready: {litter.ready_date} ğŸ’° ${litter.price_range}
{litter.available_puppies} of {litter.puppy_count} available
))}
)}
); }; const BreedingProgram = ({ user, profile }) => { return (

Breeding Program

Plan and manage your breeding schedule

{/* Breeding Schedule */}

Upcoming Breeding Schedule

ğŸ“…

No breeding plans yet

Your upcoming breeding schedule will appear here

{/* Breeding Dogs */}

Breeding Dogs

â™€

Bella

3 years â€¢ Golden Retriever â€¢ Dam

Healthy
â™‚

Champion Duke

4 years â€¢ Golden Retriever â€¢ Sire

Champion bloodline
); }; const HealthRecords = ({ user, profile }) => { return (

Health Records

Track health testing and certifications for your breeding dogs

Health Testing Status

B

Bella

Hip/Elbow: Clear â€¢ Eyes: Clear â€¢ Heart: Clear

All Clear
L

Luna

Hip/Elbow: Clear â€¢ Eyes: Pending â€¢ Heart: Clear

Testing Pending
); }; const ClientManagement = ({ user, profile }) => { return (

Marketplace Clients

Manage clients from marketplace bookings

{/* Waiting List from Marketplace */}

Interested Families

ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘§â€ğŸ‘¦

No inquiries yet

Families interested in your litters will appear here

{/* Current Marketplace Bookings */}

Active Bookings

ğŸ“‹

No bookings yet

Active puppy reservations and bookings will appear here

); }; const BreederMessages = ({ user, profile }) => { return (

Messages

Communicate with potential and current puppy buyers

ğŸ’¬

Messaging System Coming Soon

Chat directly with families interested in your puppies. Answer questions about litters, coordinate visits, and manage the adoption process.

); }; const BreederAnalytics = ({ user, profile }) => { const analyticsData = { totalLitters: 15, puppiesSold: 89, averagePrice: 1350, clientSatisfaction: 4.9 }; return (
{/* Header */}

Analytics & Reports

View your breeding program performance and insights

{/* Analytics Overview */}

Total Litters

{analyticsData.totalLitters}

ğŸ¾

Puppies Sold

{analyticsData.puppiesSold}

ğŸ 

Avg. Price

${analyticsData.averagePrice}

ğŸ’°

Satisfaction

{analyticsData.clientSatisfaction}â­

â­
{/* Charts placeholder */}

Breeding Performance

ğŸ“Š

Advanced analytics charts coming soon

); }; const BreederProfile = ({ user, profile }) => { return (

Breeder Profile

Manage your breeder information and certifications

{/* Profile Info */}

Breeder Information

{/* Certifications */}

Certifications & Memberships

Kennel Club Registration Active
Breeding Ethics Certification Certified
Health Testing Certification Renewal Due
); }; const BreederDashboard = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState(null); const [profile, setProfile] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(null); const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('overview'); const navigate = useNavigate(); // Breeder navigation matching trainer structure const breederNavigation = [ { id: 'overview', name: 'Overview', icon: ( ) }, { id: 'litters', name: 'Litters', icon: ( ) }, { id: 'breeding', name: 'Breeding Program', icon: ( ) }, { id: 'health', name: 'Health Records', icon: ( ) }, { id: 'clients', name: 'Clients', icon: ( ) }, { id: 'messages', name: 'Messages', icon: ( ) }, { id: 'analytics', name: 'Analytics', icon: ( ) }, { id: 'profile', name: 'Profile', icon: ( ) } ]; useEffect(() => { fetchUserData(); }, []); const fetchUserData = async () => { try { // Get current user const { data: { user: currentUser }, error: userError } = await supabase.auth.getUser(); if (userError) { console.error('Error getting user:', userError); setError('Error loading user data'); setLoading(false); return; } if (!currentUser) { console.log('No user found, redirecting to sign in'); navigate('/signin'); return; } setUser(currentUser); console.log('BreederDashboard - Current user:', currentUser); // Get user profile const { data: profileData, error: profileError } = await supabase .from('profiles') .select('*') .eq('id', currentUser.id) .single(); if (profileError) { console.error('Error getting profile:', profileError); console.log('BreederDashboard - No profile found, using basic user data'); } else { console.log('BreederDashboard - Profile loaded:', profileData); setProfile(profileData); console.log('âœ… BreederDashboard - Profile loaded successfully'); } setLoading(false); } catch (error) { console.error('Error in fetchUserData:', error); setError('Error loading dashboard data'); setLoading(false); } }; // Render active section content const renderActiveSection = () => { switch (activeSection) { case 'overview': return ; case 'litters': return ; case 'breeding': return ; case 'health': return ; case 'clients': return ; case 'messages': return ; case 'analytics': return ; case 'profile': return ; default: return ; } }; if (loading) { return (

Loading your breeder dashboard...

); } if (error) { return (
âš ï¸

{error}

); } // Get display name from profile or user data const displayName = profile?.full_name || (user?.user_metadata?.full_name) || (user?.email?.split('@')[0]) || 'Breeder'; const firstName = displayName.split(' ')[0] || 'Breeder'; return (
{/* Mobile Header */}

Welcome back, {firstName}

Professional Breeder

{/* Mobile Navigation */}
{breederNavigation.map((item) => ( ))}
{/* Desktop Sidebar */}

Pet Breeder

{displayName}

{/* Navigation */}
{breederNavigation.map((item) => ( ))}
{/* Main Content */}
{renderActiveSection()}
); }; export default BreederDashboard;
